version_description: Fixed issues on a certain beta OS.
Fixed issues on a certain beta OS.
Fixed an issue that prevented the introduction video from being played.
Fixed an issue that prevented the introduction video from being played.
Fixed an issue that was preventing selection tool from working properly.
Fixed an issue that was preventing selection tool from working properly.

- Fixed a crash that could happen when syncing clock with a time server.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Fixed a crash that could happen when syncing clock with a time server.
- Minor bug fixes.

APPLE PENCIL / IPAD PRO IMPROVEMENTS
- Carbo now offers 3 distinctive drawing tools: 2 fixed thickness drawing tool (best for regular handwriting & sketches), in addition to a new calligraphic drawing tool (styled handwriting like a flow pen).
-

APPLE PENCIL / IPAD PRO IMPROVEMENTS
- Carbo now offers 3 distinctive drawing tools: 2 fixed thickness drawing tool (best for regular handwriting & sketches), in addition to a new calligraphic drawing tool (styled handwriting like a flow pen).
-
Fixed a bug that could prevent some extensions from working when exporting notes.
Fixed a bug that could prevent some extensions from working when exporting notes.

- Added a privacy usage description when asking the permission to access camera and photo library.
- Fixed a bug that grew memory usage when using multiple notes and that could crash the app.
- Improved compatibility and stability with upcoming iOS

- Added a privacy usage description when asking the permission to access camera and photo library.
- Fixed a bug that grew memory usage when using multiple notes and that could crash the app.
- Improved compatibility and stability with upcoming iOS

Improved Apple Pencil Support:
- High-speed sampling (240 Hz) for 4x more accurate sketches.
- Predictive sampling for reduced perceived lag while drawing.
- Accurate handling of deferred orientation & pressure information coming through penc

Improved Apple Pencil Support:
- High-speed sampling (240 Hz) for 4x more accurate sketches.
- Predictive sampling for reduced perceived lag while drawing.
- Accurate handling of deferred orientation & pressure information coming through penc

BUG FIXES
- Fixed incorrect aspect ratio when exporting in PDF format.
- Fixed animations effects glitches that were impacting devices running iOS 10.

IMPROVEMENTS
- Filename of exported image has been made unique to avoid naming collision

BUG FIXES
- Fixed incorrect aspect ratio when exporting in PDF format.
- Fixed animations effects glitches that were impacting devices running iOS 10.

IMPROVEMENTS
- Filename of exported image has been made unique to avoid naming collision

- Fixed a crash occurring while taking a picture when "Save Pictures to Album" option is set.
- Fixed an issue with photos not always saved in Carbo's album when "Save Pictures to Album" is set.
- Fixed a crash that could occur when drawing on devic

- Fixed a crash occurring while taking a picture when "Save Pictures to Album" option is set.
- Fixed an issue with photos not always saved in Carbo's album when "Save Pictures to Album" is set.
- Fixed a crash that could occur when drawing on devic
Updated Dropbox integration for future proofing.
Updated Dropbox integration for future proofing.
Fixed crash at launch that could occur in rare circumstances when signing out of iCloud.
Fixed crash at launch that could occur in rare circumstances when signing out of iCloud.

NEW FEATURES AND IMPROVEMENTS

- Optimized for iOS 11.
- Support for iOS 11 Drag and Drop
- Tagging / moving notes: notes can be dropped on a specific tag in the sidebar which will tag them. Dragging notes to another store (iCloud, Dropbox, et

NEW FEATURES AND IMPROVEMENTS

- Optimized for iOS 11.
- Support for iOS 11 Drag and Drop
- Tagging / moving notes: notes can be dropped on a specific tag in the sidebar which will tag them. Dragging notes to another store (iCloud, Dropbox, et
iOS 11-related bug fixes.
iOS 11-related bug fixes.
Fixed a bug that could crash the app on 32-bit devices.
Fixed a bug that could crash the app on 32-bit devices.
Updated to support iPhone X.
Updated to support iPhone X.

- Fixed a crash that could occur on iOS 11.2 when cropping a picture.
- Improvements to touch gesture handling when drawing, moving, or zooming in the canvas.

- Fixed a crash that could occur on iOS 11.2 when cropping a picture.
- Improvements to touch gesture handling when drawing, moving, or zooming in the canvas.

- Inko Compatibility: added support for dragging notes to our new collaborative whiteboard app "Inko".
- Fixed a bug that caused the editing tool offset setting (Settings > General Options) to be ignored.

- Inko Compatibility: added support for dragging notes to our new collaborative whiteboard app "Inko".
- Fixed a bug that caused the editing tool offset setting (Settings > General Options) to be ignored.
More robust palm rejection to avoid leaving marks when resting the palm while drawing with the Apple Pencil.
More robust palm rejection to avoid leaving marks when resting the palm while drawing with the Apple Pencil.

This release of Carbo adds compliance with European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
In particular, for a notebook stored in a 3rd-party service (iCloud, Dropbox, and Evernote), this release ensures that you can:

1. Get a copy

Updated the crash reports framework.
Updated the crash reports framework.

- Updated for new iPhone sizes (including iPhone XS Max and more).
- Minor fixes and enhancements for iOS 12.

- Updated for new iPhone sizes (including iPhone XS Max and more).
- Minor fixes and enhancements for iOS 12.
Fixed a rare issue that could cause a crash at launch.
Fixed a rare issue that could cause a crash at launch.

Updated for the new iPad Pro
- Handling of new iPad Pro display sizes (11" and 12.9")
- Handling of new Apple Pencil double-tap gesture: switch to eraser, or last-used tool.

Updated for the new iPad Pro
- Handling of new iPad Pro display sizes (11" and 12.9")
- Handling of new Apple Pencil double-tap gesture: switch to eraser, or last-used tool.

Carbo 1.8 is now optimized for iOS 13.
- Dark Mode is supported throughout the app and enables notes that remain easy on the eyes in a dark environment.
- User interface has been fine-tuned with latest iOS 13 enhancements.

Carbo 1.8 is now optimized for iOS 13.
- Dark Mode is supported throughout the app and enables notes that remain easy on the eyes in a dark environment.
- User interface has been fine-tuned with latest iOS 13 enhancements.

• Modernization for latest OS & bug fixes
• Fixed a bug where a Dropbox notebook could fail to sync when the app was reactivated from the iOS Home screen.

• Modernization for latest OS & bug fixes
• Fixed a bug where a Dropbox notebook could fail to sync when the app was reactivated from the iOS Home screen.

Fixed a bug that could cause unwanted straight lines when sketching.
Fixed a bug that could cause unwanted straight lines when sketching.

Carbo is now available both as a one-off purchase (Pro Pack, same as before), or through a subscription (Pro Plan, new). This hybrid business model lets you economically try all features, and lets you choose the purchase model that best suits your needs.

Carbo is now available both as a one-off purchase (Pro Pack, same as before), or through a subscription (Pro Plan, new). This hybrid business model lets you economically try all features, and lets you choose the purchase model that best suits your needs.
Fixed a bug where owners of the previous version could not be entitled to access to Premium Pack.
Fixed a bug where owners of the previous version could not be entitled to access to Premium Pack.
